articles.title: Mozambique attacks expected on the agenda as Ramaphosa attends Africa summit in Paris - News24
articles.description: The situation in Mozambique is one of the issues expected to be on the agenda during a summit on the financing of African economies organised by French President Emmanuel Macron with African leaders on Tuesday.
articles.content:
• President Cyril Ramaphosa is attending a summit in Paris on Africa's post-Covid-19 economic recovery.
  • The situation in northern Mozambique is on the agenda for bilateral meetings.
